stories.title: Example: Add user authentication endpoint
stories.description: Create a single POST /api/auth/login endpoint that accepts email and password
acceptanceCriteria: Validates email format and password presence
Returns JWT token on successful authentication

stories.title: Example: Add database migration for users table
stories.description: Create a migration file that adds a users table with basic fields
acceptanceCriteria: Migration file created in correct directory
Table includes id, email, password_hash, created_at fields
Migration can be rolled back with 'down' command

stories.title: Example: Add UserCard component to dashboard
stories.description: Create a reusable UserCard component that displays user information
acceptanceCriteria: Component accepts user object as prop
Displays user name, email, and avatar
Includes hover state with subtle animation
Component is responsive on mobile devices
